citation: O'Reilly et al. 2015

method_LSWT: machine learning reconstruction of in situ observations
citation: Sojka and Ptak 2024 Reconstruction of Surface Water Temperature in Lakes as a Source for Long-Term Analysis of Its Changes
other notes?: they look at monthly rates of change (November having largest, May having smallest); useful reference to World Meteorological Organization (2019) stating that 30-year trends are best practice for climatic analyses, found only warming trends in these lakes

method_LSWT: modelled using machine learning + air temp
citation: Kim et al. 2024 Machine learning-based modeling of surface water temperature dynamics in arctic lakes
other notes?: they talk about Sen's slope but say Pinhas's method is better

method_LSWT: In situ, satellite, used skin validation with bulk . Included a probability cloud mask after Musial et al.
citation: Lieberherr and Wunderle 2018
other notes?: also calculate seasonal trends; Increasing trends from south (Lake Trichonida 0.21 K/decade,) to north (Inarijärvi 0.50 K/decade), and west (Thingvallavatn 0.38 K/decade) to east (Lake Onega 0.76 K/decade. "They talk about the correction methods for the skin to bulk difference and that it didn't improve the validation performance: "The method, applied to LSWT, only affects the systematic bias and has no effect on the variance of the error."  "Schneider and Hook  mention elevated summer trends in Northern Europe of up to around 0.8 K/dec"

method_LSWT: In situ, Satellite, derived by MODIS and Land Surface Temperature (LST)
citation: Wan et al. 2018
other notes?: Has warming (0.076 °C/year) and cooling (?0.053 °C/year) lakes.  also reports seasonal means

method_LSWT: remote sensing skin temp (google earth engine + time series modelling to fill gaps)
citation: Song et al. 2024 Lake surface water temperature in China from 2001 to 2021 based on GEE and HANTS
other notes?: (726 of lakes were small, 1-5 km2); Fig 8 shows the effect of lake area and elevation LSWT change; they found nighttime temps increased more than daytime temps, looks like they use skin temperature without correcting for bulk temperature, also noted an abrupt change in the rate of LSWT change around 2010, good notes on reasons for slower rate of change in LSWT (no ice, models may exaggerate in other studies)

method_LSWT: Data set includes remote sensing products, climate analysis data, and metereological observation data.
citation: Huang, L., Wang, X., Yan, Y., Jin, L., Yang, K., Chen, A., ... & Piao, S. (2023). Attribution of lake surface water temperature change in large lakes across China over past four decades. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 128(21), e2022JD038465.

method_LSWT: ERA5 skin surface temp (this is for each grid cell, not an individual lake though and therefore is sometimes representative of land-surface temps)
citation: Stefanidis et al. 2021
other notes?: Paper uses ERA5 climate and lake skin surface temp. Uses skin surface temperature without correctionhas several references for defending this

method_LSWT: long-term dataset (with lake characteristics) +  regression tree analysis
citation: Zhou et al., Controls of thermal response of temperate lakes to atmospheric warming
other notes?: Summer temperatures (July 15 to August 31); random forest to calculate variables important for explaining future trends (i.e. differences between air and water); large methods section with description of different approaches
link: Controls of thermal response of temperate lakes to atmospheric warming | Nature Communications

method_LSWT: Air2Water model (Piccolroaz, S. Prediction of lake surface temperature using the air2water model: Guidelines, challenges, and future perspectives. Adv. Oceanogr. Limnol. 2016, 7, 1.)
citation: Ptak et al. 2024
other notes?: Table 4 for all year-to-year configurations

method_trend: Mann Kendall trend test and Sen's slope, correlation coefficient btw LSWT and air temp

other notes?: showed different trends between annual mean and annual max, focus on differences across seasons, as well as relationship between water and air temperature
